attributes.action: Publish guidance for parents on giving children unsupervised access to internet
attributes.additional_details:
Social media and smartphones can torpedo homework and interrupt sleep due to blue light.
Social media can cause problems - self-esteem, bullying, graphic images.
The internet also provides access to porn, gambling, self-harm and dating websites.
Parents are less tech-savvy than children
attributes.background: The Government should publish guidance for parents on giving children unsupervised access to internet.
